analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttika āsava sampayutta duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na āsava sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigha

original: āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na āsava sampayuttaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: naāsavasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe
analyzed: na āsava sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
